Foresthill to Auburn along the Western States and Tevis Cup trails. Choose from 100k, 50m, and 50k course options.

Twitter Facebook Instagram

100 kilometer course

62.3 mi | 17,808 ft

Run through Volcano and El Dorado Canyons via Michigan Bluff. Enjoy the Western States Trail, Tevis Cup Trail, and the old Cool Canyon Crawl course on the way to Auburn.
